stories.text:
Or so I think haha

https://www.KissTodo.com

Yeah yeah, another todo app . But not really.

KissTodo spawned from my dislike of the currently available task management tools.

It combines focus, flexibility and simplicity to offer an improved experience over the other solutions on the market.

Most developers try to create a todo app as their first app and as such does not come from a real need and provides no real value.

I was truly disenchanted with the current task management apps out there and I am truly satisfied with KissTodo (been using it for close to 6 months).

I don't know if KissTodo is for you or not, but I believe it can bring value to those that like flexibility, simplicity, minimalism and nimbleness.

That being said, I'm ready to get roasted

I welcome any comment, discussion, suggestion or insult haha
